channel.title: 2019-11-04 09:34:24 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2019-11-04 09:34:24 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 04 Nov 2019 09:34
item.description:
The cleanest and most aesthetic airport I've seen till date. A strong cup of filter coffee, breezy winds bringing in the smell of an impending rain, a good travel book and birds chirping atop the wooden cieling... couldn't get any better than this!
